meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of sculpture.
meanings.sent1: The artist used a sculptural approach to create the statue.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed many sculptural pieces from different time periods.
meanings.sent3: The sculptural details on the building made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were so precise and sculptural, like a living statue.
meanings.sent5: The sculptural beauty of the garden was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics of sculpture.
meanings.sent1: The fabric had a sculptural drape that accentuated the model's figure.
meanings.sent2: The cake was decorated with a sculptural design made of fondant.
meanings.sent3: The sculptural clouds in the sky looked like they were carved by an artist.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a sculptural quality that resonated through the auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The sculptural details of the architecture added elegance to the building.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling sculpture.
meanings.sent1: The new building had a sculptural facade that stood out in the city.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry designer created pieces with a sculptural aesthetic.
meanings.sent3: The sculptural shadows cast by the trees created a beautiful pattern on the ground.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a sculptural bun that looked like a piece of art.
meanings.sent5: The sculptural forms of the mountains were awe-inspiring.
